spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout divergence. The 3D model transforms the apartment into a garage/dining area. Wall alignments are completely redefined compared to the plan provided. Only basic room quantities vaguely relate, but the logic is broken.

structural_fidelity.notes: Large sections of the plan (Balcony, Activity staircase, Bed 3 wardrobe nook) are hallucinated or restructured. Missing the entire balcony structure. Added a large garage entry.

furniture_mapping.notes: Total furniture mismatch. Sofa and dining table are hallucinated extensions not present in the activity or balcony areas of the plan. Added a car (unnecessary decoration).

aesthetic_quality.notes: The aesthetic successfully follows the low-poly style, isometric camera, and dark background constraints perfectly, even though the internal structure is wrong.

detected_errors.description: Missing Balcony and Activity area staircase.
Total layout distortion; Bed 3 area converted into a garage space.
Hallucinated car, dining table, and large L-shaped block sofa not in original plan.
